## Changes in v1.4.7

- Restored app identity to match the original Jarvis 6.0 line for reliable in-app updates.
- Updater packaging now uses the same bundle/app ID path expected by earlier stable installs.
- Includes prior 1.4.6 functional fixes (screenshot reliability, menu/placeholder fixes, naming consistency).

---

**Download:** **Jarvis-6.0-1.4.7-arm64.dmg** from Assets below.

**In-app update:** Users on earlier Jarvis 6.0 releases can update via Menu -> Check for updates.

**Note:** If you installed the AXRuntime-labeled build, install this DMG once manually to rejoin the Jarvis update channel.
